Discover the Art of Learning at Eliot Arts Magnet!
Eliot Arts Magnet stands as the only public arts school in the San Gabriel Valley specifically designed for middle school students. Located on a picturesque campus in Altadena, Eliot offers an innovative conservatory model that allows students to immerse themselves in various artistic disciplines while integrating the arts into a robust core curriculum. This unique approach fosters creativity, critical thinking, and a deep appreciation for the arts, preparing students for future academic and artistic success.
Families and prospective students are invited to experience the vibrant learning environment firsthand by attending a school tour. Explore the campus, meet the passionate educators, and witness the transformative power of an arts-integrated education.
School Tour Dates:
• December 13, 2024
• January 17, 2025
• February 14, 2025
• March 14, 2025
• April 18, 2025
• May 9, 2025
Tours begin promptly at 8:45 a.m.
Schedule your tour today: [https://eliot.pusd.us/about/about-our-school/school-tours](https://eliot.pusd.us/about/about-our-school/school-tours).
Charles W. Eliot Arts Academy, 2184 North Lake Avenue, Altadena, (626) 396-5680 ext. 70001 or visit [https://eliot.pusd.us/](https://eliot.pusd.us/).
